It looks like "codeToFile" was changed to "encodeToFile" in OGRE 1.9, which causes the build to fail. I guess we will need ifdefs to choose between them based on the system OGRE version.

   pCodec->codeToFile(stream, filename, codecDataPtr);
           ^
gazebo/rendering/CMakeFiles/gazebo_rendering.dir/build.make:103: recipe for target 'gazebo/rendering/CMakeFiles/gazebo_rendering.dir/Camera.cc.o' failed
